name: Where in Time Is Carmen Sandiego?
overview: Solve the Great Crimes of All Times! Carmen Sandiego, notorious ringleader of Villains International League of Evil, has confiscated a time machine and is swiping history's priceless treasures. It's up to you to catch her before she alters the course of history. - 7 Challenging levels - Hundreds of cases - Accurate and detailed cultural background FEATURES: the Chronoskimmer 325i, an advanced time travel machine that allows you voyage into centuries past. Play in 5 Different Languages!
